#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

void solve()
{
	int diff, N;
	scanf("%d %d",&diff, &N);
	int * ptr = (int *) calloc (N, sizeof(int));

	for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&ptr[i]);
	}

	sort(ptr, ptr+N);

	int code = 1;
	for(int i = 0; i < N-1; i++)
	{
		if(i == 0 && ptr[i] > diff)
		{
			code = 0;
			break;
		}
		if(ptr[i+1] - ptr[i] > diff)
		{
			code = 0;
			break;
		}
	}

	free(ptr);

	if(code != 0)
		printf("Yes\n");
	else
		printf("No\n");

	return;
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		solve();
	}
	return 0;
}
